A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So so so disappointing. I left the theater feeling nothing. The SINGLE most iconic film character in my life died in front of my eyes\, and I felt nothing. This film was shallow\, weakly constructed\, overlong\, not nearly as funny as the writers/director thought it was\, and a massive let down. As a Star Wars lover for the past 37 years\, it was appalling. The way they handled Luke's character was terrible. I could go on and on about my feelings and the intricacies of why I disliked it\, but others have already done so to great lengths.\n\nI gave it two stars because it was beautifully filmed\, and the sound was wonderful. Past that\, there were a few glimpses I enjoyed\, but they were so outweighed by the nagatives.
